About Me

I’m an Australian living in London but have now lived here so long that I consider myself more English than Australian, although don’t tell my family…

I am an experienced digital consultant with a Foundation degree focused in Web technology from Birkbeck, University of London. I have specialised in WordPress, JavaScript & Front End Development for over 10 years, and have a passion for all things web. I am committed to ensuring projects are developed to the highest standards from a design, user experience, performance and security perspective.

Over the years I have helped many clients start their online journey from initial concepts through to launch. I have worked for many businesses and global agencies, completing projects for a diverse range of clients including Samsung, Google, Amazon, Shell, Barclays, KFC, Addidas, Northface, and many more.

In my current role, I am a WordPress developer for a global pharmaceutical digital agency. I have worked on many websites for large global drug companies.
